trans-unit.source: CustomContentState enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.
trans-unit.target: CustomContentState permite navegar pelos diferentes estados de uma única parte do conteúdo de origem sem recarregar o conteúdo de origem para cada navegação subsequente.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>não armazene uma instância de um objeto de conteúdo no histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>cria uma nova instância do objeto conteúdo de cada vez que ele é para onde navegar usando o histórico de navegação.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento é projetado para evitar o consumo excessivo de memória quando grandes números e grandes partes do conteúdo estão sendo navegados.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, o estado do conteúdo não será lembrado na barra de uma navegação para a próxima.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] fornece a capacidade de associar um pedaço de estado personalizado com a entrada do histórico de navegação para uma parte do conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from CustomContentState.
trans-unit.target: Estado personalizado que está associado uma entrada de histórico de navegação deve ser uma classe que deriva de CustomContentState.

trans-unit.source: You associate a CustomContentState object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - Calling **AddBackEntry**: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Associar um objeto CustomContentState com uma entrada de histórico de navegação, usando uma das seguintes técnicas: - chamada **AddBackEntry**:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Setting <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> when one of the following events are raised: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> - By implementing <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it.
trans-unit.target: -Configuração <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>quando um dos seguintes eventos são gerados:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>- com a implementação <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>da classe que deseja estado personalizado a ser associado ao proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você chamar o **AddBackEntry** método, você deve tratar o **navegando** evento ou implementar <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] checks to see if a custom CustomContentState object is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Quando navega-se a entrada do histórico de navegação, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] verifica se um objeto CustomContentState personalizado está associado ele.

trans-unit.source: If so, it calls <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A> to allow the custom CustomContentState object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation.
trans-unit.target: Se assim, ele chama <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A>para permitir que o objeto CustomContentState personalizado aplicar o estado em que ele lembradas do painel de navegação anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.Replay%2A>

trans-unit.source: A custom CustomContentState class can override <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A> to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the CustomContentState object is associated.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe CustomContentState personalizada pode substituir <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>para alterar o nome que aparece para a entrada do histórico de navegação para o qual o objeto CustomContentState está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value that <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A> returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).
trans-unit.target: O valor que <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>retorna estiver visível no painel de navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dos vários navegadores ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState.JournalEntryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from CustomContentState must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>, and optionally implement <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que deriva de CustomContentState deve ser serializável, que significa que pelo menos deve ser aumentado com <xref:System.SerializableAttribute>e, opcionalmente, implemente <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.SerializableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don’t want the content to be retained in memory.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Ao armazenar informações no estado de conteúdo personalizado, você não pode armazenar as referências à instância da página para a qual são de lembrar o estado se não desejar que o conteúdo a ser mantido na memória.

trans-unit.source: This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Libere a instância de página e contraria o objetivo do comportamento de histórico de navegação padrão.

trans-unit.source: If you must do this, consider using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Se você deve fazer isso, considere o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The name for the content that is stored in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: O nome para o conteúdo que é armazenado no histórico de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The value of JournalEntryName is displayed from <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O valor de JournalEntryName é exibido de <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>, e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the host navigator, including <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Entradas armazenadas no histórico de navegação de avanço e voltar geralmente estão disponíveis por trás forward suspensa botões de navegação no painel de navegação [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] do navegador de host, incluindo <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: JournalEntryName is the <xref:System.String> value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list.
trans-unit.target: JournalEntryName é o <xref:System.String>valor que é exibido em uma queda de histórico de navegação para baixo na lista.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: JournalEntryName does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.
trans-unit.target: JournalEntryName não precisa ser substituído; Se não, as seguintes partes dos dados são usadas para construir automaticamente um nome de entrada de histórico de navegação, em ordem de precedência:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A> and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual - o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] para a página atual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.WindowTitle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> name of the content that is stored in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>nome do conteúdo que é armazenado no histórico de navegação.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chamado para reaplicar o estado para um item de conteúdo quando a navegação ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Replay is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> object is navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Reprodução é chamada quando um item no histórico de navegação que possui um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>objeto é direcionado.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the abstract <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState> class, Replay must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base Replay method.
trans-unit.target: Ao derivar de abstrata <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>classe, repetição deve ser substituído, embora a implementação de substituição só precisa chamar o método base da reprodução.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> owned by the navigator responsible for the content to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> is being applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> propriedade pelo navegador responsável pelo conteúdo ao qual este <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> está sendo aplicada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"></xref> that specifies how the content to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> is being applied was navigated to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationMode"> </xref> que especifica como o conteúdo para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref> está sendo aplicada navegou para.
